hours_text:
## Visit Us / Visítanos

__

__

AMSET is open seven days a week and admission is always free. Through unique collections, exhibitions, public programs and outreach in the visual arts, the mission of the Art Museum of Southeast Texas is to provide education, inspiration and creative vision throughout Southeast Texas.

Located in downtown Beaumont, TX, AMSET has something to offer everyone, including: displays by local artists, rotating galleries of eye-catching, thought-provoking artwork from acclaimed state and national artists, large-scale sculptures and an expansive permanent collection.

AMSET is proud to serve as a cultural and artistic institution for the people of Southeast Texas and beyond.

For up-to-date info on educational programs, events, fundraisers, exhibitions and more, follow AMSET on social media!

Beaumont, TX has so much to offer! Interested in staying the night and seeing the sights? To find a hotel in Southeast Texas, contact the Beaumont Convention and Visitors Bureau toll free at (800) 392-4401 or visit www.beaumontcvb.com.

AMSET está abierto al público los siete días a la semana y la admisión siempre es gratuita. La misión del Museo de Arte del Sureste de Texas es proveer educación, inspiración, visión creativa, y la divulgación de las artes visuales a través de exposiciones, programas públicos, la colección de arte en todo el Sureste de Texas.

Ubicado en el centro de Beaumont, Texas, AMSET siempre tiene algo que ofrecer para todos, incluyendo:

admission_text:
## Join & Give

#### Become a member [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20251009205012/https://amset.org/join-2/).

The benefits of membership at the Art Museum of Southeast Texas are endless. Whether you are an art enthusiast, newcomer, or an admirer of the cultural enhancement AMSET brings to the community, we offer many levels of membership.

Joining AMSET offers reciprocal memberships with the North American Reciprocal Museum Program (NARM), the Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums (ROAM) and the Texas Reciprocal Memberships (TRM), giving you free admission and special discounts to hundreds of museums nationwide.

#### Make a donation [today](http://web.archive.org/web/20251009205012/https://amset.org/donate/).

Donating to the museum is also important. Without our faithful individual donors and corporate sponsors, AMSET would not be able to offer the amazing exhibitions and wonderful programs free of charge to visitors.

AMSET is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, meaning that your donations are tax-deductible to the full extent of the law.

#### Honor someone you care about with a Gift in Tribute.

By making a gift commemorating an important date or special person, you also provide important financial support to the Art Museum of Southeast Texas. This support allows us to continue working to fulfill our mission of providing education, inspiration, and creative vision throughout our community.

About this capture

COLLECTED BY

Organization: [Archive Team](https://archive.org/details/archiveteam)

Formed in 2009, the Archive Team (not to be confused with the archive.org Archive-It Team) is a rogue archivist collective dedicated to saving copies of rapidly dying or deleted websites for the sake of history and digital heritage. The group is 100% composed of volunteers and interested parties, and has expanded into a large amount of related projects for saving online and digital history. 

History is littered with hundreds of conflicts over the future of a community, group, location or business that were "resolved" when one of the parties stepped ahead and destroyed what was there. With the original point of contention destroyed, the debates would fall to the wayside. Archive Team believes that by duplicated condemned data, the conversation and debate can continue, as well as the richness and insight gained by keeping the materials.
